attributes.action: MAKE DIFFERENT BANDS OF CARERS ALLOWANCE.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make different bands for carers allowance, depending on the level of care, the carer has to give. Some carers have to learn medical procedures, do constant care, have a few hours sleep, look after severly disabled family member. The level of allowance they receive is a disgrace, when council carers/homehelps, can make more in a days work as carers get in a weekly allowance. Carers of the severly disabled don't have a choice about being able to go out to work!
